reference.scope: VARIANTS [LARGE SCALE ANALYSIS] ARG-9; TRP-36 AND CYS-45

comment.text: Mediator of cell growth. Modulates apoptosis.
ATP + a protein = ADP + a phosphoprotein.
Interaction with Golgi matrix protein GOLGA2 leads to autophosphorylation on Thr-178, possibly as a consequence of stabilization of dimer formation. May also be activated by C-terminal cleavage.
Homodimer. Interacts with PDCD10 and GOLGA2. Interacts with CTTNBP2NL.
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. STE Ser/Thr protein kinase family. STE20 subfamily.

property.value: F:signal transducer, downstream of receptor, with serine/threonine kinase activity
P:regulation of hydrogen peroxide-induced cell death

feature.description: In a gastric adenocarcinoma sample; somatic mutation.
